name: Gemtues
description:
Hey , 

This game was made by a solo developer in less than a week for the Community game Jam 2019 and now im happy to upload it on Itch.Io

Controls:
Movements: A & D or Left arrow & Right Arrow
Shoot: SPACE
Boosters only after you unlock them: R & E

NOW YOU SHOULD BEAT THE GAME AND THE BOSS !

Thanks for playing

Font: Squarewave by jeti.
